summary: Retexture of the quiver for Sunhallowed Elven Arrows, to go better with EcthelionOtW\'s Noldorian Auriel\'s Bow.
descriptionHtml:
Sunhallowed Quiver Remix
by DJ_Zephyr

Requires Dawnguard
__________

I don\'t usually go for HD texture packs, as the laptop I play Skyrim on can\'t handle them RAM-wise, nor display them very well on its modest-resolution 15\" screen.  But when it comes to gear my characters actually use, sometimes I can\'t help but install something, especially something as gorgeous as [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3676578/?]EcthelionOTW[/url]\'s [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29329/?]Noldorian retexture of Auriel\'s Bow[/url].  I love this remix of my Argonian\'s favorite dragon-felling implement, but his redo of the quiver wasn\'t quite what I was looking for.

Never one to whine, I got to work on my own rendition.  Pulled the original vanilla texture out with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1395//?]BSA Browser[/url], extracted a polygon map from the mesh with [url=http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope]NifSkope[/url], then did the actual texture work in good ol\' [url=www.gimp.org]GIMP[/url].  Once I was pleased with how it looked in-game, I figured I\'d share my work with the rest of the Skyrim community.
__________

To install, extract \"textures\" to your \"Skyrim/data/\" folder.  Overwrite when asked.
__________

Check the permissions section for more info.  I\'m a pretty open-source kinda guy, but I\'m also big on credit where credit is due.  Thanks, and enjoy!
author: DJ_Zephyr
